Innovative Sound Booster and Equalizer Apps

Global Delight offers you innovative sound booster and equalizer apps like Boom 3D, which enhance audio on Mac and Windows. Our determination to excellence has earned us the unique recognition of being a brand to look upon and a major destination for the finest iOS, Mac, Windows, and Android apps.
We are also dedicated to developing avant-garde music, photography and video applications.

Mac Apps

Boom 3D

The Best System-Wide Volume Booster with 3D Surround Sound and Equalizer for Mac.

KRW 58999 KRW 29500 Learn More

Boom for desktop is a system-wide audio enhancer for Mac that provides immersive and intelligent audio experience with its magical 3D surround sound and futuristic technology.

Buy Now
x

Capto

The Best Screen Capture, Recording and Video Editing App for Mac. USD 29.99 USD 29.99 Learn More

Effortless screen recording, one-click screen capture and an intuitive video editing suite Capto is a must-have app for your Mac.
